title: Communication from the Disabled Persons Protection Commission (pursuant to Section 74 of Chapter 3 of the General Laws) relative to the appointment of the Director of Learning and Development, Victoria R. Gill as the DPPC Commissioner’s designee replacing Andrew Levrault, Deputy General Counsel on the Commission on the Status of Persons with Disabilities

abstracts.abstract: Communication of the Disabled Persons Protection Commission (pursuant to Section 74 of Chapter 3 of the General Laws) as of November 14, 2025, the DPPC’s designee will be Victoria R. Gill, Director of Learning and Development
